ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.guidence.imu.sensors

Class SensorBMP180

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.guidence.imu.sensors.SensorBMP180
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFrequency, IDevice, ISensor

    public class SensorBMP180
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISensor
    Barometric pressure sensor. This is used to update the current altitude and temperature parameter values. . https://cdn-shop.adafruit.com/datasheets/BST-BMP180-DS000-09.pdf http://wmrx00.sourceforge.net/Arduino/BMP085-Calcs.pdf
    Author:
    pschatzmann
